content.question: The new voltage across capacitor <math alttext="C sub a " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="V sub a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. How does this new voltage compare with the original voltage of <math alttext="V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="V sub a is greater than V sub 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V sub a is less than V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V sub a is equal to V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>
It depends on the value of <math alttext="C sub a " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.
It depends on the value of <math alttext="C sub b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="V sub a is less than V sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
